title: Rakshabandhan 2025
description: A heartwarming celebration of Rakshabandhan with the children. Our volunteers and the children came together to tie rakhis, share sweets, and celebrate the special bond of love and protection.

title: Independence Day Celebrations
description: Celebrating the spirit of freedom and patriotism with cultural performances, a flag hoisting ceremony, and activities that instill a sense of national pride among the children.

title: Annual Sports Day
description: A day filled with energy, enthusiasm, and sportsmanship. The children participated in various athletic events, showcasing their talents and learning the importance of teamwork and fair play.
